response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, we believe it would significantly benefit you and enhance your operations. Considering its worth to us and its relevance to your requirements, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional product. This offer aims to provide a fair value for both parties while ensuring you receive the best possible solution for your needs. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
